Packages
DataStructures Provides a set of data structures adapted from Weiss Data Structures in Java
foldoccmd Provides a command line interface to MECUREO services, to be used for a cgi script
foldocml Provides a clean API interface to MECUREO services, intended to be used for machine learning
foldocparser Provides parsing services for converting a FOLDOC-like dictionary into an ontology
foldocui Provides a Graphical User Interface for the services provided by MECUREO
hashgraph Provides central services for the representation, serialization and manipulation [queries] of an ontology
porterstemmer Provides an adapted implementation, and a matching interface to, the Porters stemmer
